sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.sc_ic_SectionAJAX</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>sc_ic_SectionAJAX</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var sc_ic_SectionAJAX = Class.create();
sc_ic_SectionAJAX.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getNextPosition: function() {
        var itemStagingSysId = this.getParameter("sysparm_sc_ic_item_staging");
        if (GlideStringUtil.isEligibleSysID(itemStagingSysId)) {
            var gr = new GlideRecord('sc_ic_item_staging');
            if (gr.get(itemStagingSysId) && gr.canRead())
                return sc_ic_Factory.getWrapperClass(sc_ic.SECTION).getNextPosition(itemStagingSysId, /* Display value */ true);
        }
    },

    getNextQuestionOrderNumber: function() {
        var sectionSysId = this.getParameter("sysparm_sc_ic_section");
        if (JSUtil.nil(sectionSysId))
            return 1;

        var sectionGr = new GlideRecord(sc_ic.SECTION);
        if (!sectionGr.get(sectionSysId) || !sectionGr.canRead())
            return 1;

        return sc_ic_Factory.wrap(sectionGr).getNextQuestionOrderNumber();
    },

    isPublic: function() {
        return false;
    },

    type: 'sc_ic_SectionAJAX'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2014-06-03 05:57:18</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1e2b1902c3012100c8b837659bba8f16</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>sc_ic_SectionAJAX</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">3607b4283cb1311068bcf327dfe37fee</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1e2b1902c3012100c8b837659bba8f16</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-10-25 12:20:15</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
